title: Loved By All When Rebirth: The Film King's Wife Is Poor And Fierce
alternative_title: Chongsheng Tuan Chong: Yingdi Furen You Qiong You Xiong; 重生团宠：影帝夫人又穷又凶
status: Chongsheng Tuan Chong: Yingdi Furen You Qiong You Xiong; 重生团宠：影帝夫人又穷又凶
description:
Description :
        Sheng Wenyin was deceived and died tragically in her previous life. She was reborn as the 18th-tier female star with a lot of scandals. This time, Sheng Wenyin stopped pretending and criticized the scumbag in various ways, which made her famous. Her biological parents, five brothers, and more than a dozen nephews and nieces came to recognize her as her relatives. She was also engaged to Qi Si, the nine-time Golden Award winner, as a child.
